items.title: Kutztown Root Beer
items.summary: I had ice with this one but it tastes like water. Flavor was light and normal. You'd be better off…
items.content_html: I had ice with this one but it tastes like water. Flavor was light and normal. You'd be better off just getting the corn syrup stuff out of the plastic bottles.

items.title: Triple XXX Root Beer
items.summary: This one is almost identical to Old Dominion Root Beer, though it seems to steer more towards the sugary/honey flavor.
items.content_html: This one is almost identical to Old Dominion Root Beer, though it seems to steer more towards the sugary/honey flavor. Very rich.

items.title: Bedford's Root Beer
items.summary: This one has a classic rich root beer taste, but it's a little bit lighter. There appears to be…
items.content_html: This one has a classic rich root beer taste, but it's a little bit lighter. There appears to be a very faint citrus aftertaste and it's a little on the sweet side
